name: Water Balloon Frenzy - Android (HandMade Graphics Game Jam)
name_original: Water Balloon Frenzy - Android (HandMade Graphics Game Jam)
description:
Water Balloon Frenzy is an arcade game in which you have to throw water balloons!

Enjoy a wonderful and vibrant world made entirely of plasticine and lose yourself in the beautiful music.

It is a short game, made in one week, for the competition 'HandMade Graphics Game Jam'

Credits:

•Art and Coding:  Andrei Tache

•Music and Sounds:  Lauren Pham   (SoundCloud)

Made with Construct 2 Personal Edition;

Art made with Paint.Net.
